name: grapequeen_91
comment: Absolutely loved this fizzy gem! So alive and fun, perfect for brunch.

name: village_wine_rat
comment: Great energy, slight funk, but that's Pet-Nat life. Would drink again.

name: qvevri_boy
comment: Textbook Saperavi. Dark fruit, bold, and smooth. Love this vintage.

name: ambercrush
comment: Really crisp and nutty. Lovely acidity and structure!

name: dry_red_dream
comment: Nice oak influence, but the tannins were a bit rough for me.
